course_title: Special Topics MESAS-200 Level: Mid.East in Am.Media & Culture
class_notes:
(Complete Topic: The Middle East in American Media & Culture)
(The "Middle East," "Orient" and "Islam" have long been central to American imaginaries of difference, but these concepts' omnipresence belies a knowledge gap, such that specifics about the region, its religions, cultures and peoples often leave Americans puzzled. Rather than a traditional historical survey, this course contexualizes various themes in American perceptions and connections with the "Middle East" to better understand our emotional and material investments in the region.)
course_description: Special topics in Middle Eastern and South Asian Studies, at the 200 level; may be repeated when content varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 2992, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: T. Dolan, Status: Open
